translations: [化工]锈蚀，[化工]锈污；（印花）白地沾色
使生锈，沾污（tarnish 的现在分词形式）

sentences.sentence: He is tarnishing his reputation by being a shill for the tobacco industry.
sentences.translation: 他因为烟草工业做托儿而在玷污他的名誉。

sentences.sentence: You can use chemistry to reverse the tarnishing reaction, and make the silver shiny again!
sentences.translation: 你可以同样用化学方法来逆反这种“暗淡反应”，让银器们变回亮丽！

sentences.sentence: These copycats might be tarnishing your brand name in the process which can hurt your reputation.
sentences.translation: 这些抄袭者这个举动可能玷污你的品牌名称，有损你的声誉。
